conbody.p: Eucalyptus HA installation starts with the basic Eucalyptus installation procedure. Use the same installation instructions used on the primary hosts to install the Eucalyptus software on the redundant (secondary) hosts.

You will also need to perform any pre-installation or post-installation steps on the secondary hosts that were performed on the primary hosts. This would include, for example, configuring the /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf file, configuring firewalls, disabling SElinux, configuring a SAN device, and so on. Remember, Node Controllers are not redundant.
